name: @cagents/core
description: cAgents Core V2 - Universal Workflow Architecture + Enhanced Reviewer V2.0. Provides unified Trigger, Orchestrator, HITL, Optimizer, and 5 universal workflow agents that work across ALL domains via configuration. NEW: Enhanced reviewer with intelligent agent selection (33% faster), auto-fix generation (98% more actionable), pattern learning, and diff-aware analysis. Includes universal commands and Agent_Memory system with 55 domain configs across 11 domains.
